3.2.1.2. exception_serialization.DataONEExceptionSerialization¶

class exception_serialization.DataONEExceptionSerialization(dataone_exception)¶

Serialization and deserialization of the DataONE Exception type.

__init__(dataone_exception)¶

Methods

__init__(dataone_exception)
classmethod dataone_exception_factory(exception_name, detailCode, description, pid=None, traceInformation=None)¶

Implements a simple factory that generates a DataONE exception object.

This class would normally be used by the client to re-raise an exception on the client side from an error that occurred on the server.

Returns an instance of some subclass of DataONEException.

Parameters:
  • exception_name – The class name of the exception to create. Raises a LookupError based exception if the name is invalid.
  • detailCode –
  • description –
  • traceInformation –
  • pid –
